subject: Parkinson's Disease
Philanthropy
organizations: Fox, Michael J, Foundation for Parkinson's Research
lead_paragraph: At the taping of a public service announcement to raise awareness of Parkinson’s disease, Michael J. Fox and Joe Buck remembered Buck’s father, Jack.
snippet: At the taping of a public service announcement to raise awareness of Parkinson’s disease, Michael J. Fox and Joe Buck remembered Buck’s father, Jack.
